select a2.general_product_name as goodsName, substring(replace(a1.forecast_day, '-', ''), 1, 6) as yearMonth, a1.region_code as provinceCode, a1.region_name as provinceName, a1.ids as ids from ods.ods_approval_number_shortage a1 global join ods.ods_same_variety_definition a2 on a1.general_product_name = a2.same_variety_definition and a1.product_form = a2.form_merge_name where 1=1
and a2.general_product_name global in
#{item}
and a1.is_whole = '1'
and a1.is_whole = '0'
and a1.region_code = #{provinceCode}
and a1.forecast_day = (select max(forecast_day) from ods.ods_approval_number_shortage)
and yearMonth >= #{startMonth} and yearMonth < #{endMonth} order by a1.forecast_day desc, a1.ids desc limit 0, 1 by yearMonth, region_code, general_product_name
